mapper.select: select id, uid, new_electricity_battery_sn from t_electricity_cabinet_order_history where uid = #{uid} and status = 'COMPLETE_BATTERY_TAKE_SUCCESS' order by id desc limit 1

select teco.id, teco.uid, teco.new_electricity_battery_sn as newElectricityBatterySn, teco.electricity_cabinet_id as electricityCabinetId, tec.name as electricityCabinetName, teco.create_time as createTime, teco.update_time as updateTime from t_electricity_cabinet_order_history teco left join t_electricity_cabinet tec on tec.id = teco.electricity_cabinet_id where teco.uid = #{uid} and teco.status = 'COMPLETE_BATTERY_TAKE_SUCCESS' order by teco.id desc limit 1
mapper.sql: teco.id, teco.order_id, teco.phone, teco.uid, teco.pay_amount, teco.electricity_cabinet_id, teco.old_electricity_battery_sn, teco.new_electricity_battery_sn, teco.old_cell_no, teco.new_cell_no, teco.status, teco.payment_method, teco.source, teco.remark, teco.switch_begin_time, teco.switch_end_time, teco.create_time, teco.update_time, teco.franchisee_id,teco.tenant_id
